summary: More than 350,000 people celebrate electronic dance music at the 2013 Electric Daisy Carnival.
cast: Avicii|Calvin Harris|Fatboy Slim|Tiësto|Armin van Buuren|Pasquale Rotella|Afrojack|Dione Mariani|Matt|Brian Epling|Taylor Jeffs|Jim|Austin Smith|Bassassin|Sadie|Dj Truelove|Janna|Above & Beyond|Parker Maass|Ali|Jila Alaghamandan|Jose|Charles Dé Lon Heard|Michael Ballinger|Travis Richards|Amy
title: EDC 2013: Under the Electric Sky
